Reading station data from excel templates

Source: R/loading.R
load_stations.Rd

Reading station data from excel templates

Usage

load_stations(template_path, epsg_code)

Arguments

template_path

path to *.xlsx file.

epsg_code

EPSG code for station coordinates system.

Value

sf dataframe with station information.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
temp_path <- system.file("extdata", "weather_data.xlsx", package = "SWATprepR")
stations <- load_stations(temp_path, 3035)
str(stations)
library(sf)
library(mapview)
mapview(st_transform(stations, 4326))
} # }
